author: Ben Leubsdorf
title: White House Defends Trump’s Proposed Steel, Aluminum Tariffs
text:
WASHINGTON—Trump administration officials on Sunday defended the president’s plan to levy tariffs on steel and aluminum imports and played down the likelihood the U.S. would allow for many exclusions from the proposals.
The tariff plan would do little to hurt the broader U.S. economy, said the officials, who also played down the potential impact of retaliation by U.S. trading partners.
